about_the_game:
GAME TO PLAY WHILE WAITING FOR QUEUE

Welcome to the world of CUBE, where simplicity meets sophistication. Easy to pick up but challenging to master, this game offers a relaxing and immersive experience that tests your skills while soothing your mind.

The game has no end, it was made for relaxation and infinite play with a calm soundtrack that I will expand and continue to add music, obstacles, and quality of life. This game was designed to be played casually, to pass the time, to relax, or even to get stressed haha.

I hope you can spend a lot of time playing and relaxing, collect cubes, try to stay alive for a long time or whatever, just listen to the music, play your way, and be happy

Key Features:

-Easy to Play, Hard to Master:
-Quickly grasp intuitive controls while diving into increasingly complex challenges.
-Lo-Fi Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in a relaxing atmosphere with a unique lo-fi soundtrack, perfect for accompanying your journey in the game.
-Procedural World: Explore a procedurally generated universe, ensuring each gaming session is unique and surprising.
-Minimalist and Stylish Environment: Delight in minimalist graphics that blend elegance with a modern, clean aesthetic.
Collect Cubes: Embark on a mission to collect cubes

Things to be added in the future:

-Greater variety of obstacles
-Narration and backstory
detailed_description:
GAME TO PLAY WHILE WAITING FOR QUEUE

Welcome to the world of CUBE, where simplicity meets sophistication. Easy to pick up but challenging to master, this game offers a relaxing and immersive experience that tests your skills while soothing your mind.

The game has no end, it was made for relaxation and infinite play with a calm soundtrack that I will expand and continue to add music, obstacles, and quality of life. This game was designed to be played casually, to pass the time, to relax, or even to get stressed haha.

I hope you can spend a lot of time playing and relaxing, collect cubes, try to stay alive for a long time or whatever, just listen to the music, play your way, and be happy

Key Features:

-Easy to Play, Hard to Master:
-Quickly grasp intuitive controls while diving into increasingly complex challenges.
-Lo-Fi Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in a relaxing atmosphere with a unique lo-fi soundtrack, perfect for accompanying your journey in the game.
-Procedural World: Explore a procedurally generated universe, ensuring each gaming session is unique and surprising.
-Minimalist and Stylish Environment: Delight in minimalist graphics that blend elegance with a modern, clean aesthetic.
Collect Cubes: Embark on a mission to collect cubes

Things to be added in the future:

-Greater variety of obstacles
-Narration and backstory
name: CUBE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB de RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU, 6GB dedicated VRAM (GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 791 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB de RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 compatible GPU, 8GB dedicated VRAM (GeForce GTX 1660 / Radeon RX 590)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 791 MB available space

short_description: Enter the world of CUBE: simple yet sophisticated. Master challenging jumps in a hostile environment where movement only occurs mid-air. Collect cubes, boost your score, and enjoy this relaxing, immersive game.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
